name: Blockchain
description: Understand cryptocurrency, smart contracts, and decentralized apps.

name: Digital Marketing
description: Grow your business with SEO, content, and social media marketing.

name: SEO
description: Drive organic traffic by ranking higher on search engines.

name: Social Media Marketing
description: Build a brand and audience on platforms like Instagram, TikTok, and X.

name: Content Marketing
description: Attract and retain customers with valuable blogs, videos, and posts.

name: Business Analytics
description: Use data to make smarter business decisions and strategies.

name: Finance
description: Understand corporate finance, financial modeling, and accounting.

name: Investing & Trading
description: Learn to navigate stock markets, forex, and cryptocurrencies.

name: Entrepreneurship
description: Learn how to start, manage, and grow your own successful business.

name: Project Management
description: Master Agile, Scrum, and PMP to deliver projects on time.

name: Management & Leadership
description: Develop the skills to lead teams and manage organizations effectively.

name: E-commerce
description: Build and scale your own online store with Shopify, Amazon FBA, and more.

name: Sales
description: Master the art of persuasion, negotiation, and closing deals.

name: Human Resources
description: Learn talent acquisition, employee relations, and organizational culture.

name: Photography
description: Master your camera, composition, and photo editing.

name: Videography
description: Learn to shoot, edit, and produce high-quality videos.

name: Music Production
description: Create, record, and mix music with DAWs like Ableton and Logic Pro.

name: Writing & Copywriting
description: Craft compelling copy, fiction, and content that captivates readers.

name: 3D & Animation
description: Bring characters and worlds to life with 3D modeling and animation.

name: Fashion Design
description: Learn sketching, sewing, and the business of fashion.

name: Interior Design
description: Learn the principles of space, color, and furnishing.

name: Personal Finance
description: Manage your money, budget, save, and invest for the future.

name: Productivity
description: Develop habits and systems to get more done in less time.

name: Public Speaking
description: Speak with confidence and deliver powerful presentations.

name: Health & Fitness
description: Learn about exercise, personal training, and building healthy habits.

name: Nutrition
description: Understand the science of food and how to eat for optimal health.

name: Mindfulness & Meditation
description: Reduce stress and improve focus with mindfulness practices.

name: Language Learning
description: Learn to speak, read, and write in a new language.

name: Hobbies & Crafts
description: Explore creative hobbies like painting, knitting, and woodworking.

name: Mathematics
description: From algebra to calculus, strengthen your mathematical foundation.

name: Physics
description: Explore the fundamental laws of the universe, from classics to quantum.

name: Biology
description: Study the science of life, from molecular genetics to ecosystems.

name: Chemistry
description: Understand the building blocks of matter and their reactions.

name: Engineering
description: Learn the principles of civil, mechanical, and electrical engineering.

name: History
description: Explore the events and forces that shaped the modern world.

name: Psychology
description: Understand the human mind, behavior, and social dynamics.

name: Software Testing (QA)
description: Learn to find bugs and ensure software quality with manual and automation testing.

name: Database Management
description: Master SQL and NoSQL databases like PostgreSQL, MySQL, and MongoDB.

name: Test Prep
description: Prepare for standardized tests like the SAT, GRE, GMAT, and more.
